page.description: The designer created this dialog with the List View Genie.

section.description: The data displayed in this List View dialog was read from the AlphaSports Customer table. To select the data for this list view:

step.description: In the Data Selection > Populate method list select "Prepopulate from Data Source".
Select "DBF Table" in the Data Selection > Data Source list.
Select the table in the Data Selection > Table name list.
Click '...' to select the fields to display in the Data Selection > Field list control.
Select the field to return in the Data Selection > field to Return list.

section.description: These settings return all records in record order number sequence. The Data Selection > Filter/Where Clause and Data Selection > Order settings could filter and order the records.
